title: Family Plan
description:
Description :
        Yusuke and Ayano have been married for a year.
They want to buy a home of their own… but it would have to be second-hand.
Kids… maybe they can afford one.
Being greedy is no use. They were content with what they had…
The “family image” they envisioned for themselves was “just enough."
Money can really drive people crazy.
A neo-suspense story about the bonds of "family."
